pin.title: PIN
pin.description: The PIN sent during 2FA (leave blank on first use; enter after first auth attempt)

hide-alarm.title: Hide Alarm (Security System)
hide-alarm.description: When combined with the arm switch (used or automation), the Security-System will have to be controlled by Blink App.

hide-manual-arm-switch.title: Hide Sync Module Arm Switch
hide-manual-arm-switch.description: The Sync Module Arm switch allows for automations to arm / disarm all cameras associated with a sync module

hide-privacy-switch.title: Hide Camera Privacy-Mode Enable/Disable Switch
hide-privacy-switch.description: Privacy-Mode prevents thumbnails from refreshing when the Security-System is not armed. Disabling this switch will globally disable privacy-mode on all cameras.

enable-liveview.title: Enable LiveView when clicking on a camera feed (experimental)
enable-liveview.description: By default, the camera view will expose the last recorded motion. Enabling live view will enable the experimental liveview relay

disable-thumbnail-refresh.title: Disable thumbnail refresh
disable-thumbnail-refresh.description: By default, the thumbnails of the cameras will refresh when the camera is enabled, disabling the auto refresh keeps the default thumbnail untouched.

camera-thumbnail-refresh-seconds.title: Camera Thumbnail Refresh (seconds)
camera-thumbnail-refresh-seconds.description: Force Thumbnail refresh every N seconds. Disabling thumbnail refresh setting takes priority over the timeout.

camera-status-polling-seconds.title: Status Polling (seconds)
camera-status-polling-seconds.description: Camera status does not update live and must be fetched periodically. By default this is done every 45 seconds

camera-motion-polling-seconds.title: Camera Motion Polling (seconds)
camera-motion-polling-seconds.description: Camera motion detection does not update live and must be fetched periodically. By default this is done every 20 seconds
